website_summaries.verdict: The Scosche RH1060 is a solid Bluetooth headphone pair that delivers powerful audio with boosted bass.
pros: Powerful audio performance with strong bass response, no distortion at top volumes
Well-designed and comfortable over long listening periods
cons: Purists won't love the bass-heavy mix, and many non-purists will wish these headphones dialed the bass back and boosted the high-mids a bit
Occasional transmission artifacts can be heard

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Ok, if you are looking for a nice wireless headphone this is a good choice, the material is strong enough to carry them out and they're are really comfortable..you can listen to music for hours with out take them off due to the nice leather plus memory foam...would be perfect with more bass..but if you dont want to spend $ 100 more on the beats..this is an excellent choice besides you will not notice the difference believe me...i have not tried them during a call but after make one i will leave an update...also the wireless range is as they said..30 ft with no distorsion.
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth headset leaks on the beats Bluetooth headset. The cost is way better than the beats. I have no problems with it whatsoever..totally satisfied and highly recommended. Five stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: edward aldana

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: The headphones a solidly built with top notch sound quality, one forgets that these are bluetooth until you switch them off and notice the subtle humming switch off. Bass is solid without being overpowering. Vocals are on key. Overall a good convenient listening experience
customer_reviews.author: Luyanda matlala

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: These are OK in my opinion. I found them to be bulky and did not block out surrounding noises well. I travel a lot on airplane and I want wireless headphones when I use my media devices. I could hear the sound of the jets filtering through too much. I don't own them anymore. Around the house they'd be great but not for what I wanted to use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: They sound good, but not as good as I hoped. Also seem like they're made from cheap plastic. I guess I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, but very heavy and battery dies very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones on Amazon. The Bluetooth usually connects and the sound is above average. However, the battery lasts less than one hour, even when fully charged for 24 hours. Switched to Jabra Revo and found them to be more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: francf16

customer_reviews.title: Free from Scosche still can't write a positive review.
customer_reviews.text: Everyday use "walking" putting them on and taking them off the plastic around the hinges broke. Incredibly cheap and fragile plastic. There headphones sound great but the build quality is sub par to a pair of $10 headphones you'd find at big-lots. Seriously Sylvania Bluetooth heads are built more durable than these. Don't waste your money. Junk. These will end up broke without and doubt. Scosche did offer to cover them under warranty but I had already thrown them away. Sorry but warrantying junk is just a waste of time. I switched over to a pair of HESH 3 Skullcandy's but I can't recommend them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for a really good price
customer_reviews.text: I have read several reviews on this device and I would have to say that I agree with those that say there is not much bass coming from them in comparison to Beats. However, if you are not someone who listens to a lof of hip-hop or other genres which include a lot of bass, then these headphones are better then Beats. I use them when I am watching movies or listening to music with a lot of vocals and they are terrific. I also really like the fact that it has a mic so that I can take calls with them. At the price of $200, I would say they are the better choice.
customer_reviews.author: bluegrasssoldier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much. I enjoy listening to them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Droll

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart in a Matter of Months
customer_reviews.text: Even though I treated these things as delicate instruments, placing them gently on a headphone stand whenever I wasn't wearing them, it took less than a year for the plastic to crack and snapped off in 7 different spots and the right side completely broke off from it's metal hinge and dangled by the wire. This is my second pair of headphones from this manufacturer to do this. SCOSCHE products are cheaply and poorly made. They suck. Avoid this product no matter who is selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: SCOSCHE Reference Grade Wireless Bluetooth Over-Ear Foldable Lightweight Headphones with Included Carrying Case - 40mm Realm Audio Drivers with Built-In Mic and Track Controls - Black (RH1060)
product_meta.description: Scosche Reference Grade Headphones are the perfect blend of high-quality components mixed with precisely tuned audio output to form a superior set of headphones you come to expect from the audio experts, Scosche. Equipped with Realm 40mm drivers, The Reference Headphones are designed with a custom blend of mylar, precision wound copper voice coils and rare-earth neodymium magnets to create extremely accurate musical reproduction. Each component of the Reference's motor structure works in perfect harmony to deliver impeccable audio performance. To ensure the most comfortable listening experience possible, we used genuine leather for a premium look and feel with a viscoelastic memory foam interior which reacts to your body heat to conform to your unique shape. The fully adjustable headband combined with the 2-axis Gimbal system ensures a flawless fit every time. stainless steel hinges allow the headphones to collapse for exceptional portability. These Reference grade headphones have an 8-hour playtime and 1000 hours worth of standby time. Unlike most Bluetooth headphones on the market, you can continue to listen to your music of choice once the battery dies with the built-in 3.5mm Aux jack. Just bring the included aux cable and plug in for endless listening!
feature_bullets: PREMIUM EAR CUSHIONS: Genuine leather covering and viscoelastic memory foam softens to your body heat and conform to your bodies' unique shape. Fully adjustable headband.

SUPERIOR, REFERENCE GRADE AUDIO - 40mm REALM drivers feature a blend of mylar for a virtually weightless audio membrane. Precision wound copper voice coils and rare-earth neodymium magnets create extremely accurate musical reproduction
EXTENDED BATTERY LIFE - 8 Hours of continous playtime and 1000+ hours of standby time
BACKUP POWER PORT - Use the integrated 3.5mm Auxilliary bypass by grabbing the included aux cable and plugging in and continuing to listen
INCLUDED ACCESSORIES - (1) Thermoform Case, (1) Soft Travel Pouch, (1) Cleaning Cloth, (1) Micro-USB Charging Cable and (1) 3.5mm Audio Cable
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Backed by Scosche’s Lifetime Tech Support and 2 Year Warranty
40mm REALM drivers deliver an impeccable audio experience
Ported sound chamber for optimal component Performance
Control play, pause, skip tracks and adjust volume right from the headphones with Integrated AVRCP controls
Included Bluetooth capability provides up to 33 ft of wireless range (also includes 3.5mm bypass option for when battery levels are low)
Extremely soft supple, genuine leather ear cushions feature memory foam

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars15 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
